body.name: Teeth & Gums Care Electric Toothbrush, IPX7 Waterproof Sonicare 38000VPM, Fast Charge Long Last with Intelligent Time Reminder 5 Optional Modes Dupont Brush Heads, Travel, Indoor, Outdoor, Black

features: ❤ 2 MINUTES INTELLIGENT TIMER - There is a short pause every 30 seconds in use. This is the 2 MINUTES INTELLIGENT TIMER to remind you to balance the four areas of your mouth and to reach dental professional recommended brushing time.
❤ HIGH VIBRATION - Sonic electric toothbrushes employ strong powered motors to achieve 38,000 strokes per minute. Effectively clean your teeth and gums.

❤ FAST CHARGE & LONG LAST - The charging indicator light flashes to remind the electric toothbrush needs to be charged. Last a total of 30 days of brushing cycle (2 minutes/2 times/day) after only 2-hour fully charged. IPX7 waterproof for easy water rinsing after each use.

❤ DUPONT BRUSH HEADS - The bristles are made with dupont nylon which are soft, wear-resistant and non-absorbent, provide you a safe and gentle brushing experience. W-wave brush heads perfectly fit each tooth and better remove stains.

❤ 5 OPTIONAL MODES - Customized your brushing experience with 5 modes: Clean mode, Polish mode, Milder mode, White mode, Mascare mode. 5 different modes fit for different conditions of teeth and gums and even take full care of your sensitive oral and teeth.
body.description: Model XM-801 The BLENPAPA 801 Electric Toothbrush Is A Game Changer. This brush with powerful ultrasonic technology, giving you a Over A Month’s Worth Of Manual Brush Strokes In Less Than Two Minutes. The powerful sonic movements whip up toothpaste into micro bubbles, driving them deep between teeth and along the gum line for Gentle, Effective Cleaning. It removes more stains but also Eliminates Doubt In The Quality Of Your Brushing, it truly is Engineered To Perform. 2 MINUTES INTELLIGENT TIMER HIGH VIBRATION FAST CHARGE & LONG LAST DUPONT BRUSH HEADS 5 OPTIONAL MODES

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brand Story BLENPAPA is a brand all about family, friends and care. We see a world where the highest in stylish designs (Cool) meets the most effective cleaning (Clean) to bring the best oral care tools (Care). Love sparkles within every smile, and Fairywill makes you and your love ones’ smiles radiant. Package Included - 1x Sonic Electric Toothbrush 8x Dupont Brush Head - 1x USB Charging Cable Model XM-801 The BLENPAPA 801 Electric Toothbrush Is A Game Changer. This brush with powerful ultrasonic technology, giving you a Over A Month’s Worth Of Manual Brush Strokes In Less Than Two Minutes. The powerful sonic movements whip up toothpaste into micro bubbles, driving them deep between teeth and along the gum line for Gentle, Effective Cleaning. It removes more stains but also Eliminates Doubt In The Quality Of Your Brushing, it truly is Engineered To Perform. 2 MINUTES INTELLIGENT TIMER HIGH VIBRATION FAST CHARGE & LONG LAST DUPONT BRUSH HEADS 5 OPTIONAL MODES

4 colors optional - Sonic Electric Toothbrush Specification: - Material: High-strength ABS - Bristles: Dupont nylon - Color: Pink/White/Green/Black - Power: 1.8 w - Rated Input: 3.7 v - Waterproof Grade: IPX7 - Vibration Intensity: 38000 stroke/min

Customized Your Brushing Experience with This Electric Toothbrush 8 x Replaceable Brush Heads for 2 Years to Use 2 Hours fast charge, lasts up to 30 Days 5 Optional Modes to meet all your daily cleaning needs 2 Minutes Smart Timer to encourage a healthy brushing habit

High Vibration Sonic Electric Toothbrush - When using electric toothbrush for the first time, because of the high-speed vibration of bristles, some people will have the feeling of irritation or numbness. Please don’t worry, this feeling will gradually weaken after two days, completely disappear within a week. - If you have allergic oral cavity / have just received oral or periodontal surgery or are undergoing treatment / have other symptoms in the oral cavity (weak dentures), etc. / people with continuous bleeding or massive bleeding in the gums, please do not use electric toothbrush, or consult a dentist before use. - If the electric toothbrush is not used for a long time, the charging indicator will not show for a short moment when you charge it. Please wait patiently about 6-10 minutes to return to normal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Electric toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: All I have yo say is, I live the pink color toothbrush. I never thought I'd ever see a toothbrush you can charge and thebextra brushes are amazing 👏. I love it. It cleanse just like the dentist. It deeps cleanse, brighten, etc. The best toothbrush also to get every bit of food caught up in your teeth. It's very powerful. It has 4 or 5 speeds for cleaning you can put it on. It's worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps a charge for weeks
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this toothbrush. She spends 5 mins brushing every morning and night. It has lots of setting and she got 7 replacement heads. There is also a plastic cover for the brush part. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and works perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: I love the colors white and rose gold. Also the toothbrush is lightweight and holds its charge for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lasted 19 Days, But They Sent a New One
reviews.reviewText: Edited on 21 Aug: I explained to the company that the white brush stopped working and they sent a new toothbrush. I changed review to a 4-star toothbrush. Has all the modes, lasts longer than a week, can't beat the price. If these go out or if we run out of heads, then I believe I would order from them again. Thanks20 July: We purchased these on 01 July. My wife got this white one and I purchased the black one. It has a strong motor, 5 different modes, and has lots of replaceable heads. However, my wife's toothbrush just stopped working. It charges but doesn't turn on any longer. My black one works without issue, but this white and pink brush only lasted 18 days before malfunctioning. I wish to be contacted by the seller to rectify the issue. Overall have to rate a 1 star although it is easy to use, lightweight, and affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and so cute
reviews.reviewText: I love this toothbrush so worth the money I paid it’s so cute too my boyfriend ended up getting the same one cuz he liked mine so worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Brush is smaller and bristle are lower density compared to my W*lmart generic toothbrushe. Would be about the right size to be a kids toothbrush.Once fully charged, battery seems to last for days.USB charging is a good idea, but the cord is short (12"-14" long) and toothbrush has a propietary barrel power connection so don't misplace the USB cable that came with it.Vibration patterns... My girlfriend has an "intimate" toy with the same vibration patterns. I would not be surprised of the two devices had the same motor and electronics. No idea if the different patterns have any effect on teeth cleaning.Would I buy again? No. Needs a bigger brush. I'd probably go up to a rotating brush plus ultrasonic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A year later, toothbrush is still working
reviews.reviewText: We got this toothbrush last year for Christmas and it is still working like new a year later. The extra heads are great as we change the heads every 3 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Battery life is great
reviews.reviewText: While the bristles aren’t the highest quality, they are soft. Very impressed with the battery life, I rarely have to charge my toothbrush. Other ones I’ve had need frequent charging.
